tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatData (
    threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(255),
    threat_description TEXT,
    threat_level INT,
    threat_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE threats (
    threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(255),
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_description TEXT,
    threat_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    threat_id INT REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
    implementation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
    incident_description TEXT,
    threat_id INT,
    strategy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES ThreatData(threat_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES MitigationStrategies(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE attacks (
    attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    attack_date DATE,
    threat_id INT,
    target_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE threats (
  threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  threat_description TEXT,
  threat_severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE attacks (
  attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_id INT REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  attack_type VARCHAR(50),
  attack_date DATE,
  attack_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mitigation (
  mitigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_id INT REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  mitigation_strategy TEXT,
  mitigation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE affected_systems (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(50),
  threat_id INT REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  system_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  threat_id INT REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  role VARCHAR(20)
)
